title: Enable Account Retrieval
init:
$('body').addClass('textured');$('#subheader').text(OF.page.title);$('#secure_account_form').submit(function(){if($(this).isLoading())return false;if($('#secure_account_form').isFormFilled('Please fill out all fields in order to enable retrieval of your account.')){$(this).isLoading(true);OF.api.request('/xp/users/'+OF.user.id,{method:'PUT',loader:'#submit',params:{password:' ',user:{http_basic_credential_attributes:{email:$('#email').val(),password:$('#user_http_basic_credential_attributes_password').val(),password_confirmation:$('#user_http_basic_credential_attributes_password_confirmation').val()}}},success:function(){OF.goBack();OF.alert('Success',"You have attached email and password to your account.");},complete:function(){$('#secure_account_form').isLoading(false);}});}
return false;});$('#submit').touch(function(){$('#secure_account_form').submit();});
html:
Settings

Attaching an email address and password to your account lets you log in from any device.
